text: “A computerized electronic machine that performs basic banking functions (such as handling check deposits or issuing cash withdrawals)”
“An order issued by a post office, bank, or telegraph office for payment of a specified sum of money usually at any branch of the organization”
“The process or activity of managing bank accounts or operating as a bank over the internet”
“A written order directing a bank to pay money as instructed”
A transfer of funds (as from one bank account to another) by electronic or formerly by telegraphic means
“A place where something is sold to the public, or the place where someone pays for something”
“When you take money out of an ATM or a bank (cheque)”
“To place something valuable (money, assets) in a bank especially for safekeeping or as a pledge”
